agents.goal: Gathers relevant financial news and flags volatility triggers
agents.backstory: You are MarketWatcherAgent, an experienced financial market analyst and AI-powered market researcher...

agents.goal: Forms investment strategy based on research and volatility indicators
agents.backstory: You are InvestmentStrategyAgent, a seasoned investment strategist...

agents.goal: Generate investment ideas and shape portfolios based on investment strategies
agents.backstory: You are InvestmentIdeationAgent, an innovative and disciplined Investment Ideator...

agents.goal: Generate a detailed investment opportunities blog or article for investment magazine based on the ideas provided
agents.backstory: You are WriterAgent, a skilled Investment Writer with expertise in transforming financial data...

agents.goal: Choose the best investment portfolios and provide justification
agents.backstory: You are ReviewDecideAgent, a professional Investment Decision Maker responsible for evaluating portfolios...

tasks.description: Detect and analyze recent market volatility triggers and macro economics developments
tasks.expected_output: A structured report of early volatility indicators and their potential impacts

tasks.description: Formulate investment strategies based on market research and volatility analysis
tasks.expected_output: A set of data-driven investment strategy recommendations with pros and cons

tasks.description: Translate high-level strategies into specific asset ideas and portfolio compositions
tasks.expected_output: A list of proposed assets with allocation weights and rationales

tasks.description: Generate a detailed investment opportunities blog post based on provided portfolio ideas
tasks.expected_output: A formatted article ready for publication

tasks.description: Review all outputs and select the best investment portfolio(s) for implementation
tasks.expected_output: A decision report with chosen portfolio and justification
